description:
In a statement about his nearly four-year tenure at RISC-V International, Himelstein said, "I look forward to seeing the continued success for RISC-V in the future. I will always be proud of my work at RISC-V."

The post Mark Himelstein Steps Down as RISC-V CTO to Resume Consulting Practice appeared first on FOSS Force.
title: Mark Himelstein Steps Down as RISC-V CTO to Resume Consulting Practice
